# isVisible

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the access point is visible.

## Declaration

```swift
var isVisible: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

On Apple TV, you can set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to move the focus to the access point. This is an observable property.

## Displaying the access point

- **isActive**: A Boolean value that determines whether to display the access point.
- **isPresentingGameCenter**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the game is presenting the Game Center dashboard.
- **showHighlights**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to display highlights for achievements and current ranks for leaderboards.
